channel.title: Jacob Miller's GitHub Site
channel.description: Recent content on Jacob Miller's GitHub Site

item.title: We Didn't Finish Last
item.description: Like in my last blog post, there is always a first for everything, including sports gambling. That is what we finished this semester with in out SPMC 460 class. Although I have been to Las Vegas to gamble, I have never done sports gambling before and it was definitely a new experience that I may be interested in when it gets passed in Nebraska or wherever I move to but I will more than likely bet hockey games.

item.title: My first March Madness bracket ever... SUCKED!!!
item.description: Now, Iâ€™ll give out some warnings here. I have played sports since I was the young age of 4. I grew up playing baseball, football, soccer, and ice hockey. My only exception to the sport of basketball was that I played guard in the 8th grade because I was pretty tall for my age. So I technically played one season of basketball even though I only played probably a whopping 20 minutes all year, probably 8 games.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
